Title: Grave Danger (1)
Plot: The CSI teams come together to save one of their own when they learn one team member has been kidnapped and buried alive, and now they must find him before he suffocates under five feet of dirt.
Writer: Naren Shankar, Anthony E. Zuiker, Carol Mendelsohn
GuestStars: Andrew Prine, Aimee Graham, Stephanie Hazlett-Gregg, Shannon Hazlett, Tony Curtis
